dublinCore.dc:title: 115 HR 4792 IH: Small Business Access to Capital After a Natural Disaster Act
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Ms. Velázquez introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Financial Services

form.official-title: To amend the Securities Exchange Act of 1934 to expand access to capital for small businesses affected by hurricanes or other natural disasters, and for other purposes.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Small Business Access to Capital After a Natural Disaster Act.

section.header: Expanding access to capital for small businesses impacted by a natural disaster
section.text: Section 4 of the Securities Exchange Act of 1934 (15 U.S.C. 78d) is amended—

paragraph.text: in subsection (j)(4)(C), by striking minority-owned and women-owned small businesses and inserting minority-owned small businesses, women-owned small businesses, and small businesses affected by hurricanes or other natural disasters; and

in subsection (j)(6)(B)(iii), by striking minority-owned and women-owned small businesses and inserting minority-owned small businesses, women-owned small businesses, and small businesses affected by hurricanes or other natural disasters.
